data.actual_result: It appears as if you're hovering over a clickable button, but clicking doesn't actually do anything
data.expected_result: The entire hover effect should be a clickable button
data.short_description: Hovering just over the titles in the friends list has the hover effect visible, however a small portion of the hover isn't a clickable button
data.steps_to_repro: - Possibly windows only? - Open your friends list - Hover over the top part of one of the buttons at the top that isn't selected, ensuring that your cursor isn't directly over the text, but the hover effect appears (i.e. All, Online, Pending, Blocked)
